name: com.voidfletcher.opensimplex2v
description: OpenSimplex2V 3D noise for Unity. A high-performance implementation optimized for Burst and Unity Jobs. Authored by Dylan Engelbrecht (VoidFletcher), based on the OpenSimplex2 algorithm by KdotJPG. Ideal for procedural workflows and voxel-based simulations.

samples.description: Example scripts and prefab demonstrating how to generate OpenSimplex2V 3D noise using Unity Jobs and Burst. Includes performance metrics (MSamples/s) and persistent NativeArray handling.
